description:
This plugins enables all common forms of lighting available in Three JS, and replaces the default RPM shader by a custom toon shader. To use it, simply initialize the lights on the map. Most objects are set to cast and receive shadows by default.

General tips: loading lights can cause momentary lag (during the load process only). Try to load all the lights you want on the map in one go, and make a loading screen to mask it. If you want a light to turn on and off conditionally, you can set its visibility ON or OFF, which won't impact performance.
